repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
This is a vaiṣṇava text. Four folio are blank but they are numbered on the verso. Same text with different numeration is found after 129v. The length of the text is only three folio. The last folio is not numbered. The text at the end is exactly similar to the text on 124v-125r. 1 blank folio then one list on recto, written in three columns 126r 1-1 āśleṣā mūlābhogi ta?ṃca 126r 1- 2 makhāvṛścikakalā navañca 126r 1-3 phalaṃtivṛścikato ?? 126r 1-4 uta triśaṃyanu?nā?mā ?ñca 126r 2-1 hastāya tu babalā? navañca 126r 2-2 cittrādhanuḥśaraiḥ 5? 126r 2-3 svātīmakararekāmā dviñca?? 126r 2-4 viśākhāmakarevanaṃ 1 126r 2-5 anurādhāḥ kuṃbhe nāpi 4 126r 3- 1 jyeṣṭhākuṃbhekṛtā 3? 126r 3-2 mūlaṃkuṃbhe gacca 4? 126r 3-3 pūrvāṣāḍhāṃinenaviḥ dviṃca ?? 126r 3-4 uttarāṣāḍhāmīnegrāya ..?
xv 124v 4 tmā sudurlabha iti sutrābhyāsaḥ śāstraḥ pari 125r 1 samāptirdyotayatīti sarvaṃ samaṃjasaṃ hariḥ oṃ
Number 235 is written in pink chalk.

msItem.title: Sacaritrasudhānidhi
msItem.author: Vīrarāghava
msItem.incipit:
1v 1 to bhare . gośa (deleted 2 syllables) kṛt salīlā līpte deśe jana vivarjite . ñat tat kriyate hinānaravikṣaṇavarjītaṃ
1v 2 lakṣmīpatipadāṃbhojasantataśyāna saṃyutaṃ saṃkalpapūrvamārabdhaṃ sātvikatyāgasaṃyutaṃ
msItem.explicit: 124v 5 tmanāṃ te jānavān māṃ prapadyate . vāsudevaḥ sarvamiti samīhātmā sudurlabha iti sutrābhyāsaḥ śāstraḥ pari 125r 1 samāptirdyotayatīti sarvaṃ samaṃjasaṃ hariḥ oṃ

support.p: Thin palm leaf as guard folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil nuerals in left margin, last folio not numbered.
supportDesc.condition: Some folio are dark brown in color. Corners are broken.

additions.desc: Front cover at the centre is written: nidāttvi? naim?va rāmānujadāsasya śaccaritrasudhānidhiḥ śrīmate śrīnivāsamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīḥ
On front folio in the left margin is seen indriyaśuddhīḥ saṃkīrṇaṃ.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.

TEI.text:
1v 1 to bhare . gośa (deleted 2 syllables) kṛt salīlā līpte deśe jana vivarjite . ñat tat kriyate hinānaravikṣaṇavarjītaṃ
1v 2 lakṣmīpatipadāṃbhojasantataśyāna saṃyutaṃ saṃkalpapūrvamārabdhaṃ sātvikatyāgasaṃyutaṃ
124v 5 tmanāṃ te jānavān māṃ prapadyate . vāsudevaḥ sarvamiti samīhātmā sudurlabha iti sutrābhyāsaḥ śāstraḥ pari 125r 1 samāptirdyotayatīti sarvaṃ samaṃjasaṃ hariḥ oṃ
